thread.title: Jammu rocks with protests over beef party by MLA Langate Engineer Rashid
thread.title_full: Jammu rocks with protests over beef party by MLA Langate Engineer Rashid

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Jammu rocks with protests over beef party by MLA Langate Engineer Rashid
text:
Comments Jammu, Oct 8 : Several political, social and religious organisations today held demonstrations in protest against the ‘beef party’ held by the Independent MLA from Langate Engineer Rashid at MLA Hostel in Srinagar. The activists of Bajrang Dal held a protest and also burnt the effigy of Rashid at Rehari area of the city and demanded his arrest for hurting the sentiments of Hindu community. Another protest was held by the activists of Jammu and Kashmir National Panthers Party (JKNPP) at Exhibition Ground here in which they demanded registration of criminal case against the MLA. (Also Read: Nitish Kumar, Lalu Prasad slam Narendra Modi over attack on RJD chief beef remark) The legislator from Langate had yesterday hosted the beef party in the lawns of MLA hostel in Srinagar, with the guests being served beef kebabs, ‘ristas’ (meat balls) and beef patties. Rashid had claimed that he did not want to offend anyone but wanted to send a message that “no courts or legislature can prevent the people from eating what they want”. Condemning the state government for allegedly facilitating Rashid to organise “beef party” in the MLA Hostel and to deliver highly provocative speeches during the said party, JKNPP Chairman Harsh Dev Singh sought registration of criminal cases against him. Singh also sought immediate arrest of Rashid for what he termed the most heinous offences openly committed by him in a government institution. Activists of Hindu Shiv Sena also held a protest at B C Road area here demanding stern action against the MLA. They also burnt his effigy. The VHP condemned Engineer Rashid for holding the beef party and said Rashid had hurt the sentiments of the Hindu community across the globe. VHP state president Ramakant Dubey demanded immediate arrest of Rashid. Others including Kranti Dal, Shiv Sena Hindustan, Sri Ram Sena, Rastryawadi Shiv Sena and Freedom Fighter Association also denounced the MLA for holding the beef party.
